reviews.review: 才两百多小时的新手，但是这个游戏真的停不下来。需要战术。总之狂推
Muito bom. Unica sugestão é uma comunidade melhor, mas essa vem melhorando com o tempo
Bo kurwa 99% to jebane kurwy na haxach
its good but can get boring
Buen shooter entretenido. Fuerza a jugar en equipo y de una manera mas táctica que otros juegos de este tipo. El mayor problema es su tóxica comunidad.
es un juego de shooter de puta madre que es de estrategia de pensar es la hostia

Though the community can be pretty toxic at times, there are still some pretty great people playing. You can still find some good fun in this game.

The crap valve pulled with the graffiti's is pretty dumb, coming from playing Counter Strike Source, where you could upload your own sprays. Just another way they are trying to monetize CS.

If you don't mind salty people and skins, counter strike is one of the best skill based games on the market.

If your going for achievments use "Practice With Bots" and of course with actual practice, and go into a Deathmatch, get any weapon and unload if you want to figure out why you aren't landing shots, here's a hint, this isn't goddamn COD.
Excelente para gente competitiva que busca llegar alto
If you want to have fun, get Prime. Difference between Prime and Non-Prime is light and day
This Game is very competitive but can be rage inducing
Only Con is that games can take an hour or more. Amazing game
Just don't hack and be good at the game also don't kill your friends to many times in competitive
Заебись, если вырубить голосовой чат и в ММ никогда не заходить

Boa Noite! 

Talvez vocês não leiam, mas esta dificil jogar esta semana , porque estou caindo com pessoal de muito longe, no caso eu Brazil e entro no servidor do EUA, fica dificil porque muito ficam tiram saro do sotaque, e como todos sabem o CS é jogado com as CALL, muitos me quicaram e acabei perdendo patente e levando VAC de 2 horas por nada , quero que revejam esta restão URGENTE!
cs go 好玩不花钱，但就是一点开箱千万别上头 好吧。 Its so fking hard to get any gloves or knives skins, lmao.
É um bom FPS para passar o tempo.
This game is pretty fun, it's always been fun for me. It's best to buy Prime though. Since CS is now free, hackers are everywhere now. :/
yes this game gave me sex nigger
its good, if you're good, the game is good, and you can be good
